text: Di aawaa dela e hai tigidaumaha hiahi, soukohp Elijah gaa hana gi di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha, ga helekai, “Meenei Yihowah, go di God o Abraham, mo Isaac mo Jacob, gi haga modongoohia ina dolomeenei, bolo ma Kooe dela go di God o Israel, gei au go dau dangada hai hegau, dela ne hai nia mee aanei huogodoo gii hai be au helekai.
